column5: Sweet video!
Nice Video thanks for the post
Thanks guys
The footage of the take was amazing, wow!
Great video !
Mike I have been trying to get some good footage of a figure 8 strike but each time the camera would be dead or out of screen to high or to low. I think I have it figured out a bit better now.
Did the figure 8 so many times with no luck.  Thanks so much for posting the video.  Felt like I was there!
Here is a little video I did from yesterday out musky fishing. More to follow but I wanted to make this its own
That's gnarly.  Like the slow mo Mike.
Really cool....I'm thinkin that fish is really mad at the black thing
Cool Video Mike.   Hitting boatside like that is really fun.
Great video!
Thats really coolâ€¦.almost makes me want to go musky fishing(almost).
Holy that was awesome. Can't wait for September
GREAT VID!  Im gonna share that!
I know that voice. Think I'll go throw mud on his new steelhead rod....LOL
Awesome video Mike!!
awesome video!!!
killer catch, watching that thing swim up from the depths was wicked, thanks for posting!
Thanks everyone  still playing with features for making movies and find new things each time.
Great video.......Thanks for sharing

Have you tried a magenta filter for the underwater camera Mike?  Suppose to help when shooting in greenish water.  There are a few videos on YouTube showing the comparisons of shooting with and without one.
I like how you sped it up on the turn and he nailed it. I usually slow down on the turns and speed up on the straightaways. He really wanted that thing.

I had the filters but they were for the hero 3+ I have to try and find them for the hero 3  I like to speed up on the outer turn it keeps the blades moving. I do mix it up if they are following for a bit. It's tough to say for sure I usually try and read the fish and this one I saw crusing under the boat and turn when it heard the bait coming
That's gnarly.  Like the slow mo Mike.   X2 SWEET MIKE.
Awesome!!
great take. Thanks for sharing
Awesome Mike!!! Impressive.   What St Croix LT is that you're using to bomb those?
This one is the big nasty
Really cool Mike! Wish I was there... At least i got a 94.5 incher this weekend.  Cheers, Ron...
Lol yes Ron that was a great one you got there
Cool vid!
